generated_doNotEdit.title: Leashable
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows this entity to be leashed and defines the conditions and events for this entity when is leashed.

fields.title: Can Be Cut
fields.description: If true, players can cut both incoming and outgoing leashes by using shears on the entity.

fields.title: Can Be Stolen
fields.description: If true, players can leash this entity even if it is already leashed to another entity.

fields.title: Leash
fields.description: Event to call when this entity is leashed.

fields.title: Unleash
fields.description: Event to call when this entity is unleashed.

fields.title: Unleash Interact Only
fields.description: When set to true, "on_unleash" does not trigger when the entity gets unleashed for reasons other than the player directly interacting with it.

fields.title: Presets
fields.description: Defines how this entity behaves when leashed to another entity. The first preset which "filter" conditions are met will be applied; if none match, a default configuration is used instead.

subForm.description: Defines how this entity behaves when leashed to another entity. The first preset which "filter" conditions are met will be applied; if none match, a default configuration is used instead.

fields.title: Filter
fields.description: Conditions that must be met for this preset to be applied.

fields.title: Hard Distance
fields.description: Distance (in blocks) over which the entity starts being pulled towards the leash holder with a spring-like force. Entities can enter and stay in vehicles if the leash is stretched under this distance, but will dismount once it exceeds it.

fields.title: Max Distance
fields.description: Distance in blocks at which the leash breaks.

fields.title: Rotation Adjustment
fields.description: Adjusts the rotation at which the entity reaches equilibrium, when "spring_type" is set to "dampened" or "quad_dampened".

fields.title: Soft Distance
fields.description: Distance (in blocks) over which the entity starts pathfinding toward the leash holder, if able.

fields.title: Spring Type
fields.description:
Defines the type of spring-like force that pulls the entity towards its leash holder:
- "bouncy": Simulates a highly elastic spring that never reaches an equilibrium if the leashed entity is suspended mid-air.
- "dampened": Simulates a dampened spring attached to the front of the leashed entity's collision. It reaches an equilibrium if the entity is suspended mid-air and aligns with the movement direction.
- "quad_dampened": Simulates four dampened springs connected to the center of each side of the entities' collisions. It reaches an equilibrium if the entity is suspended mid-air and gradually aligns with the leash holder over time.
